mapper.insert: insert into t_base_pic (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, URL, NAME, UID, ITEMID, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_base_pic set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UID = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEMID = #{itemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, URL, NAME, UID, ITEMID, STATUS from t_base_pic where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, URL, NAME, UID, ITEMID, STATUS from t_base_pic
